headline: Evaluating Vistra After a 17% Stock Pullback and Recent Market Volatility
summary: Curious whether Vistra is a bargain, overpriced, or something in between? You are not alone. Figuring out the real value of a stock is what keeps investors up at night, and we are diving right in. Vistra’s stock has certainly kept things interesting lately, with a huge 701.6% gain over three years, but a recent 17.1% drop in the past month shows just how quickly sentiment can shift. That sharp pullback follows increased market buzz around utility stocks as investors react to changing energy...
